title: Royal Impulse Multi-Gaming Family
body:
__**Hi Guys!**__

The name's *LadyChikorita*, I'm part of a Multi-Gaming community named ***Royal Impulse*** and we're looking for new and cool peoples to hang out with! Whether it be playing games, listening to music, watching stuff together, or just hanging out! We play loads of stuff ranging from MOBAs and MMORPGs to FPS's and RTS games. League, Overwatch, Ironsight, and Elder Scrolls Online to name a few...

Our discord server also features an economy system where you can do a lot of different things to earn money, just being active, playing blackjack, roulette, or even resorting to crime and robbing if that's your thing!

We only ask for a few things of our members really.  
__Be 18+__
 __have a mic and be willing to use it__
 __have and use Discord, and lastly __
**be okay with dark/offensive humor!!**

**Join us via this link!**
https://invite.gg/royalimpulse

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}  
Look forward to seeing you!
